When I heard about the treatment of a friend in jail. Really á

I cannot remember a situation in which I felt ashamed. I was á

My mother always took my side. That brought about quarrels with á

When on holiday in Greece I called my best friend, she told me á

Together with a little brother I biked on a lonely road in the á

We lived with 3 persons in the loft of a house. It often occurred á

I partly colored my hair black. My mother didn't like it and á

I was shopping in Utrecht with friends, we also ate some chips á

I had subscribed for this test. We were informed by our á

I was out with a friend in a place where it was very, very busy. á
When we wanted to go I bumped a person, who dropped his glass á

It appeared that I gave correct answers to all questions during á

My father was very angry with me, and I locked me up in the á

My sister borrowed some LP records for a party. She had left them á

When my grandmother died, her life was heavy and her last hours á

When I watched TV and saw a performance of "Prince" (a popidol). á
Disgusting he'd better be a stallion.

We had arranged a beach party with 20 people. There my father got á

When I flew out to my mother and made rude remarks because I felt á

Unofficially I was informed about my results of the final á

I am thinking about death, the eternal of it, the unknown, the á

If they force me to eat something I don't like. For example, my á

I had to leave Den Helder and all friends and acquaintences, á

Being on view in a meat-factory. Pigs being cut open, pigs being á

When I have suffered a terrible fit of eating, that frequently á

When my father (physically handicapped) asks me to do something á

When the parents of my girlfriend gave permission to spend our á

When the relationship with my first girlfriend broke up and I á

Someone who always took care for the key of the sportshall stayed á

When my last relation broke up.

When working in a chemical laundry, I saw rats and maggots in the á

When I forgot the birthday of my best friend and I innocently á

When I made love with a girl, which I don't really love. However á

When I passed the driving test (on the second try).

I was walking in the wood at night with my boyfriend. Very á

I am a teacher in arts and crafts (boys from 15-16 years). for á

My sister was in coma for 3 months (due to a train accident). Now á

I lived together with my boyfriend. One night he stayed away and á

I talk too much, cannot keep things secret. I promised a friend á

My parents appreciate very much me and my boyfriend coming and á

When I started a relation with a girl, with whom I have fallen in á

Once sitting in the cinema, I became very anxious (watching a á

I work for a journal. Once the lay-out came to nothing, due to á

My mother was stuck by an apoplectic fit, was hemi-paralyzed and á

Each time I am confronted with reports about repression and á

I wrote a letter to my father to ventilate my bottled up á

I chatted up with a girl who I didn't love. She however was á

I felt very happy when I heard I had passed the examination to á

On a holiday in France I made a walk in the woods all alone and á

I invited two friends. We should go out together. Those two girls á

I felt very sad when my boyfriend wanted to break our á
relationship. Our relationship lasted two years, we shared á

I broke an egg, with which there was something wrong, into a á

When I was 10 years old I stained our bench with a fountain-pen, á

Then my mother catched me, she saw it and became very angry.

I spend the night with my boyfriend, while there was also a á

After 15 minutes I felt miserable and awoke my boyfriend to tell á

I liked to see off my aunt (from Zaire) to the airport. That á

I went to the ballet lessons with a little friend in the dark. On á

what time the lesson would be finished. I gave him an avoiding á

I was sleeping nicely until in the middle of the night when I became á

My boyfriend with whom I had a longlasting relationship, fell in á

On school, during a fancy fair, there was a stand of amnesty á

A friend catched me while masturbating. I am not fully sure á

When I was 4-5 years old my mother gave me some parts of a á

When I had to undergo the final examination of secondary school, á

When I had left my home, my father, under false pretences, got me á

When my father took away my cherised diaries to burn them (I was á

I felt very sad when I left home because I could not stand it any á

A friend and a girlfriend went to Rome for 10 days with their á

When my mother found a leaf of my diary where I had written about á

Very often I take care for my little sister and oversee her á

Passing my driver's examination (after two failures).

When I was six years old we were on holiday in France. There was á

A quarrel with my mother because I thought she said very á

The disease and subsequent death of a close acquaintance. Sadness á

When I take a look into a slaughter-house and when listening to á

Making bloopers: e.g. telling something negative about a certain á

When a friend of mine had her period, while thinking she was á

Fear to come and live in Nijmegen.
When the coach of our team degraded me to the second team.
When a friend died.

After a quarrel with my mother in which matters were "inflated" á

In college, I started a discussion with the teacher referring to á

When a friend, after being free of drugs for half a year, started á

In a disco, there was a dirty little chap who punched my bottom.

When a friend who comes visiting me unexpectedly asks for coffee á

When talking with my sister, she often ventilates prejudices, á

I was in a hopeless situation in a dirty place. No study, no á

It is very difficult to relate it to a certain event. I am á

When I arranged our holiday in Paris, and my girlfriend raised á

I suffer form a disease of my muscles. However, I cannot talk á

Going out for dinner, or during one ice-cream and four spoons.

In 1983 a sadist provoked my sister in my presence.  He tried á

I won the first prize at the science fair, the first of the kind á

 Before going in to see it I was afraid as it was the first time á

When a close relative of mine passed away, it was the first time á

A recurrent lovesickness.

Sitting alone in a quiet room, concetrating on things happening á

I have high expectations for my future but if I pursue the á

Every year during carnival I am very joyful I have an intense á

The only event I can remember is having a nightmare when I was á

Losing a boyfriend for the second time to my friend. He fell in á
love with her. The same thing happened a few months earlier with á

There is a person whom I disgust. Evrey time I see her I get this á
terrible feeling I disgust her whole appearance.

When I am angry at someone without a good reason. Later on it á
proves that he didn't do anything wrong.

My mother always evokes feelings of guilt in me. For instance á
when I miss the last bus I know she will be concerned for me and á
stay awake till I arrive.

When I came again in contact with a girl I liked very much. And á
most important she also liked me.
DO NOT REMEMBER.

After a hard day at the university I also had to make dinner that á

When my father had a cerebral hemorrhage.

A story I heard recently about a baby dying after sexual á

During a party I overheard a conversation about china. When I á

When I didn't bring my girlfriend home one night. Later she told á

When an old schoolfriend phoned me to arrange an appointment to á

Standing in a crowed shop or in a closed room with too much á

My older brother who gives me unwanted advices about problems in á

My girlfriend left the house in which we lived together a few á
months ago. This made me very sad.

When my parents behave very "witty" towards me, they make insipid á

Making an unexpected talk with a professor in the canteen. This á

Flirting with other girls while I already had a very good á
relationship. When there are problems in my relationship, the á
flirting increases as does the feeling of guilt.

Occurs frequently. A recent experience: when going out with many á
friends, nice music, after the examinations, I felt so happy I á

I lived alone in a repulsive area in the city of Rotterdam. I was á

and the night I frequently felt anxious.
Being treated unfairly and being hurt by someone I love.

When I finished a relation after four years, leading to much á
sorrow for the other one and myself ("although it was the best á
solution").

Every time I meet a certain person. We cannot get on well á
together, we dislike each other.
When coming up for trial because of shop lifting.
Being catched when stealing.

I fell over head and ears in love with someone who appeared to be á

One night I had to bike home all alone after a party. Then I á

I had a quarrel with my father, because I was of the opinion that á

the room.

My boyfriend finished our relationship when I started studying á

A friend had a quarrel with the mother of her boyfriend because á
she and her friend decided to go and live together. She needed á
money for removal, then she made a great effort to reconcile.

I was catched when, as a little girl, I played tricks. I was very á

I was of the opinion that 12.00 pm was too early to be back at á
home after going out, so I stayed away longer, knowing that my á
mother would be worried.
I was called and invited to have a talk about a job I wanted to have.

Once late at night (around midnight) a person asked me to give á

After this he followed me for a little while.

There was a lot of irritation between me and a person who lives á

The end of a relationship (after 4 years) by doing this I hurt á
the other person very much.

I saw a terrible accident in which the driver of a motor was á

I am troubled by hair growing in my neck. I was troubled by this á

Against the will and without the approval of my parents I went á

When a friend of me came for an unexpected visit.
When I thought the house was on fire at night.

When I was at an official meeting I asked a question to a person. á

When the mother of a good friend of mine died.

A teacher was very blunt in his relation to a child so that the á

I was very angry at someone.
That I didn't take the time to make an appointment with someone.

After I saw my family and good friends back after staying one á

When a good friend of mine behaved in a very cool manner to me á
for a very long time.

I was in the library of medical psychology and walked into the á

A good friend of mine died. During the funeral I felt an intense á

When an uncle of mine who is very ill started to cough wich á

At Christmas night there was a good movie on television which I á

A good friend of mine who is at the moment in a foreign country. á

When I go out with my friend with enough money and good sense to á

When going out I am threatened regularly by two punk-girls.
A friend started to shout at me. He called me an old frump.

My relationship with a boyfriend was finished and I didn't á
succeed a years-course.

My father is someone I disgust. So when he comes close to me á

After a party in which I made love with a boy in public. Later on á

When I got associated with a boy one year ago, I neglected my á

When I made the winning goal during a very important football á

A terrible cloud-burst started when we were camping in a tent on á

Seeing for the first time pictures about the so called á

The death of my mother-in-law after a long sick-bed. at the á

I was looking at a one-man show on television. He told very á

(Later on it proved that this was his intention).

I was drinking a glass of wine and eating something when there á

When I don't go to my parents on Sunday and phone them to tell á

When it appeared that I was not pregnant when I was several weeks á

The same situation as with sadness. I was afraid about what my á

Once again my parents distroyed a relationship.

I had this feeling when my parents distroyed a relationship with á
a boy because they thought he was bad and irresponsible.

After the accident which I described in SHAME. I came to myself á

A sudden end to the relationship with my first girlfriend.

I heard part of a conversation in which one talked very low about á
women.
In an important situation for me, my father behaved inadequately.
When I took the car of someone without saying it to him.

I felt joy when I heard that I was accepted for the Free á

When a good friend of me told me one evening that she didn't want á

I felt anger when at the end of a telephone call, a good friend á

I was very sad when I had to leave persons with whom I had a very á

I felt disgust after watching a picture on television about á

I made a very insulting remark against a person whom I care for á

I felt guilt towards my mother when I went to live on rooms in á

When my boyfriend and I went out for a dinner and subsequently á

When I walk through streets late at night. This is because I and á

When I got the feeling that I had to do all the housekeeping á

When my best friend got a boyfriend. Because of this a á
relationship of ten years was finished abruptely.

I feel disgust when hearing or seeing other people being treated á

In my opinion guilt is a feeling which goes together with shame. á
Here then I refer to the situation of guilt.

When I became angry at my boyfriend without any reason. I know he á
cannot bear me being angry at him and that he can't study anymore á
then.
The day I heard that I passed the high school exam.

I was living in rooms in a very lonely, quiet neigbourhood. á
During the night it was very silent and this frightened me. The á
fact of being alone in that house frightened me.

We had to move to a very different city because the company where á
my father worked also moved to that place. It was very difficult á

A very close friend of mine died. I read it in the newspaper. I á

A girl who also hires a room in the house where I live always á

A teacher spent a lot of time helping me without wanting to be á

I knew I had to take an exam very soon but yet I couldn't start á

When Christmas holiday started, I felt very joyful when I á

I was raped once when I went through a dark alley at the back of á

I was very angry at my father when he didn't give me as much á

When my gradmother died.  I felt very sad then ... The feeling á

When I ate a rotten apple.

When I didn't meet an appointment I had made. The person phoned á

When I have to take exams I am very excited and have not much á

My boyfriend was playing with my cat. He was playing games with her á

When I slept for the first time all alone in the house where I á

My boyfriend told me that I had very high demands towards him. In á

I hadn't been at my parent's place for a long time. When I went to á

I read a story in the newspaper about butchers treating their á

I was eating in a very nice restaurant, when the servant asked á

A few weeks ago I thought about an exam I had to take soon. I á

During my high school time I succeeded to play a concert of á

When a car ran into me. The moment that I felt on the street I á

When our cat was killed in a car-accident I was very angry at the á

There is a boy who I love very much. I asked him to have dinner á

I saw a dog who was eating excrements.

During my Highschool time I was chairman of the student's á

During a holiday in East-Germany I got aquainted with a boy who á

When I saw a good friend again after not having seen her for a á

When I slipped on a glazed frost road and a car almost ran into á

When people without my permission pry in my belongings and take á

When I noticed that my parents were not in such a prosperity as á

Seeing a pornographic movie in which animals were used.
When I went for the first time in my life to a nudist-beach.
I was caught sneaking sweets.

When I went to visit a friend in the hospital. She had to undergo á

I had an appointment with a good friend. He came 3 hours later á

I worked together with another student on a computer-assignment. á
She didn't do her best and didn't prepare herself for it. She á

I had a quarrel with a good friend about the fact that I didn't á

I was hitch-hiking when a man stopped and gave me a lift to á

The man was fat and tatooed.
I forgot something I agreed upon with a good friend.

I became very angry with my friend because he didn't do shopping, á

When I got the positive result of my examination to achieve the á

When I was 12 years old I frequently was pursued by others and á

My girlfriend one day went out and promised to be back at 6.00 pm á

When my girlfriend decided to finish our relation.

When once again I drank too much and felt very rotten the morning á

When I overslept for the second time on the day I had an á

When having a relationship, I made love with another girl.
When the girl with whom I am in love smiles at me.

When biking and I felt very bad (problems with heart and á

When a discussion resulted in an insult, which in my opinion, was á

When I realized that it did not make much sense to start a á

When I had to finish those big amounts of homework in time.

When I gave water to the plants of a friend. Then one plant fell á

When I had broken a piece of glass of the refrigerator by putting á

On my birthday when several good friends came to visit me.

I went to the apartment of my boyfriend and saw some people á

I felt very lonely, was very dissatisfied with myself when I á

A scene in a film in which one man repressed another one. By á

When I do not succeed in making myself clear to other people. á

After the death of a girl who I disliked.

I felt joyful when my boyfriend met me at the station, while at á

I was very startled when, at night at 2.00 am, a boy approached á

When someone does not listen to me after having asked me to á

I felt very sad when I heard that a friend had committed suicide.

One night I saw a man being knocked down by two other men. The á

When I made acquaintance with the parents of my boyfriend for the á

When I cancelled an appointment with an idle story. Afterwards á

For a few days I felt very miserable, distressed and listless, á

I was testing my new roller skates in the street, suddenly a dog á

Out on a weekend with a group of people, everybody felt irritated á

Recently I felt very sad without any reason. It lasted for a few á

Someone told me a story of Amnesty International: a boy was á

I cried for 3 hours because I felt very miserable. Then I called á

Yesterday my boyfriend and I wanted to play billiards. However á

When my boyfriend and I experience something nice or when we have á

The weather is very bad (fog and slipperiness) the newcast á

Someone told me that he would stay at my home for one night. á

We had to take our cat to the vet for mercy killing (an á

When people are eating unsavoury (smacking, belching, speaking á

A girl in our class was nicknamed "fatsy". Later, I heard that á

I made an appointment to pick up someone. However I arrived á

One night I had a very good conversation with two friends. I then á

In the morning just before going to the dentist.

When a very close friend with whom I have a very intimate and á

When a good friend with whom I had an intimate relationship made á

When I made love with someone who I didn't really love. Sometimes á

I had a short lasting sexual relationship with someone I didn't á

When I realized that I avoided two good friends with whom I á

My boyfriend suffered form ill health for some months, this week á

When going out in the weekend I have to bike 5 kilometers through á

I made an appointment with a friend to drink coffee togehter. á

My dear hamster (called Hannes) died at the age of 2 and 1/2 years. á
His shape forced me to mercy killing (an injection).

I read a newspaper report that a little boy was forced to look á

We had made an appointment to complete together a piece of work. á
It appeared that I was the only one who hadn't prepared anything.

I call my mother at least once a week. However last week I á

After the funeral of an acquaintance I felt very depressed. That á

I had to call someone and make an appointment for a conversation. á

When, after having cleaned up the kitchen, two hours later I saw á

One night I was called and told that the father of a close friend á

I cannot remember exactly such a situation. But I know that á

Once by coincidence I clutched a stranger (in a rather intimate á

I once torn the inner tube of a bike, that was not mine. Then I á

When I found out that the girl, with whom I was in love, loved me á

When my mother threatened me with thrushing me of the stairs, when á

When being made look a fool by the teacher in front of the class á

My mother unjustly became very angry with me and sent me to my á

My mother was very angry with my little sister and told her to á

A friend came for dinner with me at home. His parents are á

Once after falling in love, I imagined that particular girl to be á

Once a week I work as a volunteer in a biologic garden. this work á

My friend and I planned to search for old documents and utensils á

When someone made me a compliment after an examination just at á

When I went up the stairs in a high, dark house full of shadows, á

A friend told me it would be better for me not to be on familiar á

I had a good relationship with two friends. Once without reason, á

When I see that some people remain cold and egoistic with regard á

When I state things with great positiveness and try to convince á

A certain friend evokes positive feelings, when I am with him but á

A few days ago, I hitch-hiked to Arnhems with a friend. á
Everything went well: they picked us up very quickly, the sun was á
shining, I was feeling free and, for the first time after long á

My grandmother several times has been struck by cerebral á

I had made an appointment with three friends. We had to go out á

I finished the relationship with my boyfriend, after having felt á

A few days after I had finished the relationship with my á
boyfriend, we had a quarrel. Then he hit me. At that moment I á

I was taking a shower in a cubicle in France. Then I discovered á

I know that a certain person feels very lonely, and that she á

A close relative of mine underwent a difficult operation, and everything á

When I get into the tube or the train without paying for the á

A class-mate urged me to carry out a particular protest along á

When I failed the entrance exam to IMEC.
When I saw someone eating live worms.

When I was a child my parents caught me with a pornographic á

[ I can not remember anything in particular.  What I can remember á

When they told me that I had got a study grant.
When I wore a grotesque figure hanging down my back.
Because I had not studied.
When my father was saved from a severe work accident.

When I was a child I hid under the sheets out of fear of á
darkness.
When I first saw a person begging.
When my basket ball team lost the qualification at a final.
When I see rotten meat.
When a person whom I do not want to see is continously present.
When I failed an exam I thought I could pass easily.

When I got to know that I had passed the university entrance á

When I was very young, one day, I was in the street with my á

friends, I saw a dog and began to pat it.  My father told me á

brother told me that I would die and I could not stop crying á

We hitch hiked our way back from a town rather drunk.  We were á
dropped in another town which was unknown to us.  I needed to á
urinate, so I did it on a wall which turned out to belong to the á
military headquarters.  They arrested me and made me pay a fine á

late for anyone to give us a lift.

I was to meet a girl in a discotheque.  She was very pretty and I á
was very happy.  But she did not turn up.  Thank God, there were á
some other friends there and I was able to have a more or less á
good time.

I had a class-mate who was rather stupid.  I did not like him á
but I respected him.  When he tried to talk to someone, they á
would not listen to him and I could not bear seeing this.

I met a friend in a discotheque. he was with a girl and he told á
me that she was not his girlfriend.  I, to say something, á
commented that she must be a viscious woman.  He then told me á
that she was his girl.

I went to a pub with a group of friends (not very close) and á

The day some friends of mine and I decided to go to Galicia on á
holiday.
Before an exam which I, finally did not take.
At home when they lost three pieces of my puzzle.
When I had an argument with a friend.
When I am dirty because I have not had a shower for a few days.
Once I did not have enough money to pay for a coffee.
After an argument with a friend of mine.

A friend of mine told me that I had passed the entrance exam to á
the university.
Before taking an exam.

I fell outside the door of my house.
My younger sister was almost run over by a lorry.

Once I saw some children hunting a cat to death.
The death of a friend.
When I saw a scene on T.V where a castration was shown.

While I was waiting for them to give me the marks of the most á

When I learned that a friend of mine had not been speaking to her á

On seeing a scene of an accident in a magazine.

A few days back I had to ask a professor a ridiculous question á

After several days delay in my girlfriend's menstration I was á

On New Year's Eve, when I went to the house of my girlfriend's á

The day the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the á

When I got to know the details if the famine in East Africa.

In a rather important exam, when they caught me red handed á

When my father addressed me directly and maliciously, thus á

When I was a child, one day while playing, I fell up to my waist á

A murder.
When I failed two subjects last year.
When I see people who have no sentiments.

I think that I am rather shy and do not mix with people as I á

When I triffled with other people.

When I was told that I could take a week off and go for a trip á

I was with a girl one night and then did not call her again, á

On a trip to Santander we wanted to stop at a curve because a á

My cousins were playing at home and one of them broke a decorative á

All my friends arranged to go for an afternoon snack and they did á

I was swimming in the sea and a wave took the top part of my á

I was looking after a child and she fell down because I was not á

When I pass exams, or when a close friend of mine recovered á

Fights that I see in the middle of the street, robberies, fear of á

During a family discussion on my future and my prospects as a á

[ Depressions.]

Some people whom I do not like at all, and one of the reasons is á

For example, to feel bad because of one's attire, to be among á

Some of my friends had an argument.  I had earlier phoned one á

When I met a very close friend of mine after one year of á

There was an earthquake for several minutes and I was on the á

An argument among several friends because of the irrational á

A class-mate died after being two months in coma, after a car á

When inadvertantly I found myself in the ladies room.

We were in the country and I walked away from the others one á

When I was young, I became very angry as I was not allowed to á

When I inadvertantly entered the ladies room and met some girls á

I was entrusted with an object and while using it I handled it á

One night, walking along a park, I began to think that some á

I had an exam and I had it well prepared.  I did the first part á

Each time the professor asks me a question in class.

I had an argument with my boyfriend.  It was my fault but my á

An invitation to spend 5 days at the seaside with all expenses á

A film on zombies.

When males in my family try to assign house duties exclusively á

I had a quarrell with my boyfriend and decided to finish with him á

On the road there was a dead animal with its entrails showing and á

We were discussing a subject ( I knew very little about it) and I á

I could have passed the last exam of the public competition, but á

Before knowing my marks I was not sure that I wanted to go to á

I learned that a class-mate had given a list, of peolpe who help á

I phoned two friends and was not able to arrange a meeting with á

I had to meet a girlfriend to go out for a drink and she arrived á

One night, after having decided to finish our relationship, I á

The begining of my relations with my current girlfriend.

A typical family argument.
The disqualification of two of my mates in the military service.
The sight of vomit on the street.

I was going around with a girl without loving her.  Not only did á

I met a girlfriend again after not seeing her for several months. á
 I saw her in a discotheque.  We do not like discotheques but we á

I was walking in the countryside alone when I came across two á

I was angry when my sister began to talk nonsense and to laugh at á

My mother was working with a knife and we were all laughing á

I read a book whose plot and expressions were obscene and in very á

My mother had just been teaching me how to crochet, which is á

It was about midnight and I wanted to go to the countryside (I á

A friend of mine suggested that I become a film extra.  The idea á

When I miss the train and I am late, and I have to wait half an á

Once I failed seven subjects at school and I was terrified to á

They asked me to throw the rubbish into a dustbin which had some á

I was driving a friend's car, and I got close to the pavement to á

Every time, in the last few days, when my girlfriend told me that á

I stayed alone in the dark at night in the mountain, waiting for á

We were at school, in the room for audiovisual classes.  We were á

[ During a summer holiday a French girl and I had becoe back á

In a Mathematics class, the professor asked me a question and I á

A party I went to last Christmas.

During my last exam.
When I had to come back from my village last Christmas.

A fall during a climb, with almost with no previous experience.

On the occasion of assignment of tasks and responsibilities in á

I was talking to a friend and he said something which was very á

When I do or say something inappropriate which hurts people close á

When a study tour got confirmed, I was happy all the time till    á

My dog had been run over and died near the house.  We had to pick á

In an exam when I answered the questions with very little á

I was at the cinema with my sister and her boyfriend.  A man á

My father began to say incoherant things concerning my brother's and á

I had failed some subjects in mathematics.

I was at the table at a French friend's house.  They served me a á

This morning I spent a lot of time on my toilet and missed the á

I was alone at home when I broke a figure and then mended it.  A á

When I fell crazily in love with a beautiful girl and she returned á

When I was caught by the police and was kept with a group of á

When I was the target of a great many insults and completely á

Having suffered a not very pretty sight, I reacted by uttering á

When I came across an old friend whom I had not seen for a very á

I had an accident in which I hurt my eye.  I was afraid of having á

When I was accused of something I had not done.
A close friend died.
I saw some images of a decapitation in a horror film.

I slipped and fell in to a puddle and people started looking at á

I made another person cry for an unjustified cause.

I received an unexpected letter from a friend I had met a short á

A certain person started to say dreadful things very calmly, I á

A certain person whom I respect and esteem a lot pays me no á

In a bus I fell sick and vomitted in a bag.  The entire situation á

A person (a male) told me that he liked me.  He has a problem, he á

I rejected a person whom I had always thought to be a friend.  I á

When I received some good news : I obtained an amount of money I á

When my relatives and I were in a car going slowly on a frozen á

My parents were having a typical family argument.  I came in and á

I was going away, leaving a dear person behind.

At a friend's party there were several allusions to my sexual adventures.

I was in a cafe with another person when, suddenly, several close á

When I talk to my friends.
When I am walking on the streets and see a gang of thugs.
When people harrass me I feel oppressed by their behavior.
When I am with a friend and we have to leave each other.

When I saw a film in which the man suffered from an illness and    á

When I was in the toilet and someone came in.

[ When I act thinking that I know everything and I then realize á

A friend of mine felt bad because of something I had done to á

Almost always when I go to fetch the results of an exam.

Seeing a film in which there were several bloody crimes.

I received a letter from some friends, who do not live in Madrid, á

I found a big, black spider near a bag of food.

I was in a very small class and the professor said something á

I had arranged to meet my friends at a certain place, and I was á

The man I am going around with gave me a very special present.

I thought that I would be scolded for a comment I had made, which á

My sister came back home and reproached me for not having tidied á

At my grandfather's funeral.  I remembered that the thing he á

I had to wash my grandmother because she did not get to the á

In a very crowded shop I was distracted and missed my turn in the á

When I saw a friend of mine, whom I had not seen for a long time á

When I was walking in a field which had a lot of manure.

I liked a boy and I would feel shy and then blush.  The more I á

I am not very affectionate and I feel guilty as I do not give as á

I was spending the week-end with some friends.  We were waiting á

I was walking down a little village at night.  There was nobody á

My parents did not let me go on holidays with my friends.
I was told that a friend of mine was going to Mexico for good.
Finding a hair in the soup.

I had promised to say goodbye to a person who was going on a á

I was on holidays, and I was going to meet a friend whom I had á

We were camping in the mountains, and a friend and I went for a á

I sent a book to a friend of mine.  The book meant a lot to me á

To say goodbye to dear friends after the holidays.
Ever since I have been a child, the sight of any kind of wound.
At the seaside, when a wave suddenly came and took off my bikini.

My sister in law was about to have a child, and there were some á

Waiting for my marks in a difficult subject.

I gave some personal information to a friend of mine, and he told á

The holidays come to an end, and the next day we had to go back á

There was a cat on the street.  It had been run over and its head was á

I had a small argument with a relative and some other people got á

Last course, when I passed with good marks three subjects which I had á

I was attacked by a man at a bus stop at night.

My mother told me that I could not go to the mountains.  Despite á

I was drinking coffee in a cafe and I found a piece of scrubber á

When I went to my boyfriend's house for lunch and saw his á

At school, I did not tell the teacher that it was me who á

One evening, I was with a group of friends having a talk.  There á

We were walking in the park at night.  It was very dark and very á

[ One day I arrived home rather tired and found the house..... In á

When I met a friend of mine after several months.

I was watching a procession during the Holy week, and a penitent á

My mother read a letter that a friend of mine had written to me á

My parents scolded me a lot for something I had not done.  It was á

At the hypocrisy of some of my friends.

I greeted and embraced the wrong person thinking that it was my á

Due to a misunderstanding on my part, two of my best friends á

I feel this emotion very often when I try to express my feelings á

A friend of mine said in a group that she felt lonely and á

When I came to know that my father and his parents were : self á

When I was young I felt guilty because I thought that I had á

On holiday, seeing the lanscape in Gerona.
Travelling by coach on a rather narrow and wet road.

They wanted me to pay for a ticket twice because they said that á

Arguing with my younger cousin.  She is rather a nuisance but I á

 A moment later, an unknown car picked up a person from this á

 all my friends had done something wrong, or may be it was the á

After going through much shame, I became a Christian and á

When a person the same age as me insisted that I call him á

When they found out that I was absent from school, I had gone to á

When a friend tried to back bite me on false grounds.  This made á

When I hooked a girl in Kitwe.  She was very beautiful for my á

When someone tried to bewitch me and my friends at night.

When I was victimized for running away with a girl who was á

1976, Soweto uprising in South Africa and the racist Gout's á

When two of my children were critically ill with measles.

I stormed into the room, hoping to cool myself with some soft á

I was in grade 7.  We had an inter-house volley-ball competition. á
 In Luapula I was the youngest member of the team and I scored  á

I was escorting a relative on a bike, we passed by a dark road á

The comrade staying next doors insulted me for what he called  á

I wanted to punch him but instead went for a walk to the mining á

A close relative was at odds with a very powerful firm.  All his á

A pig in the well from which we drink.

My girlfriend had started going around with another boy.  Her á

 Both of us were present and she chose the other guy.

I bumped my dad's car in a lamp post.  He was not at home then, á

I was at school whhen I received a letter from the dean of my á

This was at secondary school, a prefect framed up some case and á

While paddling in the river during a storm.  I feared drowning.

Over an argument.
At school - being whipped by the teacher in front of the class.

" I have been hearing rumours that you have not been allowing á

 I lost my temper and screamed at him.  Later I felt very ashamed á

That afternoon I received two messages informing me, one that my á

This happened when I went to visit my friend in Chelston and á

When a girl I wanted very much, said "yes" and fell in love with  á

One evening, when I had gone fishing with my friends, we heard á

A class-mate answered (accidentally) the call of nature in the á

I was double crossing my fiancee and one day she caught me red á

I took some money from my parent's house without asking them for á

I was annoyed this particular day as it seemad that the odds were á

Dad had just married his second wife (my step-mother) and I did á

When I heard a lion roar for the first time.

When a friend told me that my education had nothing to do with á

When I was going home, I saw somathing which looked like a snake   á

This happened recently, I  was in the dining hall and one of my á

I insulted the girl to whom I had proposed when she turned me á

I send a word to my boss through my servant telling him that I á

We were driving at night and I realized that a car was following á

 I really felt like hiding.

After a long time (of no communication with him, physical á

I forgot that the course instructor had directed us to go for á

Getting drunk and creating a lot of trouble at a place I respect á

 I was looking at the man with his hand on the trigger.

This is an incident that many of us witness in our everyday life á
in a city like Bombay.  One day I was travelling by bus, three á
men dragged two fellows out of the bus.  Once outside they were á

and they were being beaten by all and sundry.  I thought to á

everyone is after someone else.  One waits to cut the throat of á
the other one just for a living, (money).  When I think about á
such things - the purpose of life, etc, I feel very disgusted and á
dejected.

This is an event I will never forget.  I am considered a good á
mimic.  This particular day we were waiting for a professor á
to take her class.  This  professor had a peculiar accent and a á
very horrible way of lecturing and to top it all we had this á
class at the fag end of the day.  So this particular day I got á
into my element and started imitating the professor, and the á
professor entered the class right in the middle of it .  I was á
unaware of her presence, some of my friends tried to warn me but á
it was of no avail as I was too engrossed in mimicing.  Then I á
suddenly noticed the silence and turned around to see her á
entering the class.  I do not know till today if she actually saw á
what I had been doing or she had completely ignored it.  Through  á
out that lecture I died of shame.  All the more shameful was the á
fact that she gave me a character certificate.

I was walking alone along the place where people fear that there á

My first day to work in hospital, when I was dressing wounds I á

One of those days when I was going to school with my brother and á

I entered the hostel this year.  My mother was ill and could not á
